version_description:
Hi foodies !

We’ve got some new cool features to present with this version :)

- The search bar has been optimized just for you : both faster and with more results with the integration of thousands of barcodes
- Discover cheerful pop-ups to stay motivated!
- You can now refer your friends to track your progress together and compare your photos
- Your profile can be customized and you can also change the distribution of macronutrients
- We have simplified the barcode scan which can be done directly from the search bar

As usual, all your feedbacks are welcome :) Write us at contact@foodvisor.io

Hi foodies,

Here are the new features for this update:

- All your nutritional data is saved in Health, so you can find it directly on Health, and this data can be used by your other applications if you wish
- The new barcodes can be added using different portion sizes
- We were cool we fixed a lot of bugs :)

As usual, your feedback, ideas and suggestions are welcome :) Write us at contact@foodvisor.io

Hi foodies,

We have many surprises for you in this update:

- The onboarding is simplified and you’ll be able to create an account faster
- Food search is optimized and has become super fast :)
- We’ve improved the app in case of a bad internet connection
- Names of manual meals are better managed
- We’ve switched to Swift3

As usual, all your feedback, suggestions and ideas are welcome :) Write us at contact@foodvisor.io

Hi foodies,

Check out the new cool features in this update :


We have created new filters to make your photos look even more beautiful and we’ve made it easier to share them on social networks #nofilter
You’ll find cute guakkas on several screens, we let you discover them by yourself - some are hidden :p
If you make a screenshot of your food, you’ll be able to automatically share your picture!
The design is improved
We were nice, we fixed some bugs

As usual, all your feedback, suggestions and ideas are welcome :) Write us at contact@foodvisor.io

Hi foodies,

Check out the new cool features in this update :


We’re introducing smart notifications! The app learns from your eating habits and notifications are pushed at the right time ;)
Quantities can be edited more precisely
Simplified sharing photos
Improvement of the design
We were nice, we fixed some bugs

As usual, all your feedback, suggestions and ideas are welcome :) Write us at contact@foodvisor.io

Hi foodies,

Check out the new cool features in this update :

- Discover a new screen to take pictures :)
- Adding meals is even easier with our new multi-function button!
- For our new users, we’ve made the tutorial much more comprehensible so that you can master the app on day one.
- We decided to be nice so we fixed some bugs

As usual, all feedback, suggestions and ideas are welcome. :) Write us at contact@foodvisor.io

Hi foodies,

We hope that you will like this update, here are the new features:

- Many of our users have asked for this feature, so we’ve implemented it :) Discover an infinite scroll with all your beautiful photos and meals that are more than a week old!
- We have improved the performance of the app, so it should be faster
- We decided to be nice so we fixed some bugs

As usual, all your feedback, suggestions and ideas are welcome :) Write us at contact@foodvisor.io

Hello foodies,

We have a lot of surprises for you in this update:

- You’ve been waiting for this for a long time, now you can use the app when you’re offline. You will be able to admire your photos and correct them even when you are in the subway :) You will have access to most of the features of the app when you’re offline, apart from analyzing a meal.
- You will be able to create your own custom foods. You will have your own food database in addition to that of Foodvisor.
- The customer support has completely changed, you’ll see …
- The design has changed a lot, we hope you’ll like it :)
- You can correct the barcode data when it’s wrong
- You can change the number of calories to consume in a day while keeping the macronutrients ratio recommended by our nutritionists

As usual, all your feedbacks and ideas are welcome :) Write us at contact@foodvisor.io. We reply to all our messages.

Hey foodies,

We hope you will enjoy this update! Here are the latest features:

- You can move your meals from one day to another using drag and drop (exclusively for users who have iOS 11 ;) )
- There is a chat where you can ask questions and seek advice from our nutritionist
- We have set up tooltips to explain the new features that comes with each update
- Finally we fixed some bugs

As usual, all your feedbacks and ideas are welcome :) Write us at contact@foodvisor.io. We answer all your messages.

Hey foodies,

We have changed some designs and fixed some bugs in this update. We hope you will enjoy it!

As usual, all your feedbacks and ideas are welcome :) Write us at contact@foodvisor.io. We answer all your messages.

Hey foodies,

A bug was stopping some of you from using the app. Sorry about that, it’s now fixed!

Questions? Feedback? Issues? Send us a message to contact@foodvisor.io

Thanks to your emails, we’ve noticed and fixed a bug in the Nutrition graph.
We’ve also added a loading screen when we need to update our database.

And we’ve also done some nice improvements for our new users :)

Questions? Feedback? Issues? Send us a message to contact@foodvisor.io

Do you like our little avocados, aka Guakkas? They're now on iMessage! Get ready to send avocados to all your friends via iMessage!
For the lucky owners of devices with 3D touch, you can now take a photo and scan a barcode directly from your device home screen!

As per usual, our developers have worked very hard to fix bugs and crashes :)

Questions? Feedback? Issues? Send us a message to contact@foodvisor.io

Foodvisor will help you to eat smarter and healthier by analyzing an image of your meal and producing a nutrient report in just seconds.

After several months of development, we are pleased to introduce a brand new version of Foodvisor and the launch of a Premium version with more personalized advice to help you reach your goals faster.
Don’t worry, all the features that you’ve used until now are still free. Only the new features are for payment and you can choose to pay or not :slightly_smiling_face:

Here are the new features:
• Discover a brand new tabbar
• Chat with our RD nutritionists on the app. They'll answer your questions, provide advice and facilitate the successful completion of your goals.
• Follow a diet adapted to your objective and your lifestyle: rebalancing diet, bulking up, vegetarian, gluten-free...
• Receive a daily assessment of your caloric and nutrient intakes which will include advice, tips, and recommendations aimed at helping you fly closer to meeting your goals. This daily assessment will highlight your excess intake and deficiencies for each macronutrient so that you can learn to balance your diet for optimal results.
• Access our catalogue of recipes corresponding to your profile and diet. After you've completed a recipe, you can add it to your food diary.

We hope you’ll enjoy this update!

Any questions? Any problems? Or ideas for new features? Send us an email to contact@foodvisor.io

Foodvisor will help you to eat smarter and healthier by analyzing an image of your meal and producing a nutrient report in just seconds.

Discover recipes adjusted to your profile, chat with our RD Nutritionists and get daily recommandations thanks to our Premium version!

We hope you’ll enjoy this update!

Any questions? Any problems? Or ideas for new features? Send us an email to support@foodvisor.io

Foodvisor will help you to eat smarter and healthier by analyzing an image of your meal and producing a nutrient report in just seconds.

You don’t want to spend time editing you meal on the app while you’re about to eat? Good news, you can now take the photo of your plate and select « Edit later » ! :)
We’ve also improved the experience of our new users to make it super easy to add their first meal.

We hope you’ll enjoy this update!

Any questions? Any problems? Or ideas for new features? Send us an email to support@foodvisor.io

Foodvisor is a pocket-nutrition coach that will help you eat healthier and reach your goals. Just snap a picture of your plate and you will receive its nutrition facts!

In this release, we've done some some design improvements. We've also fixed issues on the weight screen and when you were linking Foodvisor with a smart watch.
We’ve also improved the design of our app for our dear iPhone X users.

We hope you’ll enjoy this update!

Any questions? Any problems? Or ideas for new features? Send us an email to support@foodvisor.io

Foodvisor is a nutrition coach that will help you eat healthier and reach your goals. Just snap a picture of your plate and you will receive its nutrition facts!

What’s NEW ?

- New food scoring : We’ve made it easier to understand what is good for you by ranking foods from “Very good” to “Caution"
- Favorites : You can now save your meals to your favorites and add them easily to your journal
- Take the perfect picture : we’ve added real-time guidance on the camera to make it easier to take great food picture. AR Kit rocks !
- New advice cards : our nutritionists have added 30 new cards for Premium plans

Welcome Elsa, our new RD nutritionist, who will be available through our chat to answer all your questions and help you reach your goals !

Any questions? Any problems? Or ideas for new features? Send us an email to support@foodvisor.io

What’s NEW ?

- Tips of the day : Discover our advice and tips everyday on your journal. Learn more about our awesome features, and adopt a healthier lifestyle more easily.
- Faster, better, stronger : Find your food faster thanks to our new search.
- And as usual, lots of small improvements to make your favorite pocket nutritionist easier to use.

Any questions? Any problems? Or ideas for new features? Send us an email to support@foodvisor.io

BLACK FRIDAY SPECIAL OFFER : From November 23d to November 26th, get 50% OFF on Premium Annual !

Here's what you’ll get for less than a coffee $$ per month :
- Unlimited Chat with our RD Nutritionists
- Hundreds of delicious & healthy recipes
- Great diet plans to reach your goals ( Balanced, Low Carb, Vegetarian, Bulk, etc. )
- Daily personalised assessment of your food.

This is a major update of our app, we hope you’ll enjoy it :)

- New water logging to make sure you stay hydrated this summer :)
- You can now choose to count calories burned by activities n you daily goal, or not.
- New diets : Get ready for this summer with our new Beach Body program. Or try out our new Clean Eating program, or any of our other diets like Keto, Low Carbs or our 6 Week Challenge.
- And as usual, lots of small improvements to make your favorite pocket nutritionist easier to use.
